verses.verse: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.
The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face to shine upon you and be gracious to you.
May he give you the desire of your heart and make all your plans succeed.
This is the day that the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it.
The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusts in him, and he helps me.
Delight yourself in the Lord, and he will give you the desires of your heart.
The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and do not lean on your own understanding.
But they who wait for the Lord shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings like eagles.
The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear?
I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
And we know that for those who love God all things work together for good.
The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.
But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness.
Be strong and courageous. Do not fear or be in dread of them, for it is the Lord your God who goes with you.
The Lord your God is in your midst, a mighty one who will save; he will rejoice over you with gladness.
Cast all your anxieties on him, because he cares for you.
Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above.
The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases; his mercies never come to an end.
Rejoice in the Lord always; again I will say, rejoice.
But seek first the kingdom of God and his righteousness, and all these things will be added to you.
For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
Fear not, for I am with you; be not dismayed, for I am your God.
The Lord is near to all who call on him.
And now, O Lord, for what do I wait? My hope is in you.
The Lord is good, a stronghold in the day of trouble.
But you, O Lord, are a shield about me, my glory, and the lifter of my head.
The Lord is my rock and my fortress and my deliverer.
He who began a good work in you will bring it to completion.
The Lord is gracious and merciful, slow to anger and abounding in steadfast love.
For nothing will be impossible with God.
The Lord is my portion, says my soul, therefore I will hope in him.
But as for me, I will look to the Lord; I will wait for the God of my salvation.
You make known to me the path of life; in your presence there is fullness of joy.
The Lord upholds all who are falling and raises up all who are bowed down.
The name of the Lord is a strong tower; the righteous man runs into it and is safe.
And my God will supply every need of yours according to his riches in glory in Christ Jesus.
For the Lord God is a sun and shield; the Lord bestows favor and honor.
The Lord is my strength and my song, and he has become my salvation.
Be still, and know that I am God.
The Lord is faithful in all his words and kind in all his works.
For you formed my inward parts; you knitted me together in my mother's womb.
The Lord is my helper; I will not fear; what can man do to me?
Give thanks to the Lord, for he is good, for his steadfast love endures forever.
The Lord preserves all who love him.
But the Lord is faithful. He will establish you and guard you.
Great peace have those who love your law; nothing can make them stumble.
The Lord is good to all, and his mercy is over all that he has made.
Blessed is the man who trusts in the Lord, whose trust is the Lord.
The Lord is near to the brokenhearted and saves the crushed in spirit.
But the Lord is the true God; he is the living God and the everlasting King.
The Lord is my portion, says my soul, therefore I will hope in him.
The Lord is my strength and my shield; in him my heart trusts, and I am helped.
The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear?
The Lord is my rock and my fortress and my deliverer.
The Lord is gracious and merciful, slow to anger and abounding in steadfast love.
The Lord is good, a stronghold in the day of trouble.
The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
The Lord is near to all who call on him.
The Lord is my helper; I will not fear; what can man do to me?
The Lord is faithful in all his words and kind in all his works.
The Lord is my strength and my song, and he has become my salvation.
The Lord is good to all, and his mercy is over all that he has made.
